Translations.Text: Mi sen d ippunefk mmi s n Meryem, d amedya, agdud ik iugwi t
Qqaoen: "ppif ioebbiten nne$, ne$ Neppa"? Qqaoen ak d akka, i nnmara. Ih, nitni d agdud ipmeoean
Neppa d amdan kan. N$at it, Nerra t d amedya i At Isoail
Lemmer i£ £ ihwi, a Nerr lmalayek di tmurt, deg umkan nnwen
Neppa, s tidep, d ppbut n yimir. Ur ppilit di ccekk fellas. Ddut yidi; wagi d abrid uwqim
Ur kwen issefra$ Cciian! Ih, neppa d acengu nnwen n uuee
Mi n iusa Aisa s issekniyen, inna: "usi$ d $uowen s uuwab, ad awen beggne$ kra, seg wayen i$ef temgarradem. Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Oebbi, s tidep, d Mass iw u d Mass nnwen. Ihi, aabdet eI, d wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Mgarraden ikabaren garasen. A tawa$it n wid idensen, ilmend uaaqeb n wass aqeoean
Day a poaoun imir, ad asen d ias, deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Iebiben, assen, ad u$alen wa d acengu n wa, kkes ed wid ipeezziben
